text: Enterprises are made up of multiple teams
that analyze data to improve operations
and better serve customers,
while also innovating products and services.
But oftentimes, this data is scattered,
owned by different people,
difficult to access or impossible to manage.
Amazon DataZone simplifies this process,
enabling you to share data at scale
across organizational boundaries
with built-in governance and access controls.
It removes the undifferentiated heavy lifting
by using machine learning to automate cataloging
and accelerate data discovery,
which gets you to insight faster
and fosters more collaboration.
You can analyze data and derive a deeper understanding
from the right information, regardless of where it's stored,
and without requiring domain knowledge
of underlying AWS services.
Create easier access for data people
by creating data sources in a data catalog,
with names, descriptions, classifications, and more.
The iterative workflow creates a decentralized
and federated ownership model across your organization,
and helps you balance both innovation and control.
Give your data people the freedom they want
with the confidence and governance you need,
with Amazon DataZone.
